aka: The Glorious Acceptance of Nicolas Chauvin

cast.name: 亚历克西斯·曼蒂 Alexis Manenti
卡罗利娜·德吕亚-加雷尔 Caroline Deruas-Garrel

director.name: 本杰明·克洛提 Benjamin Crotty

this_title: Le Discours d’acceptation glorieux de Nicolas Chauvin
trans_title: 尼古拉·沙文的光荣致辞
The Glorious Acceptance of Nicolas Chauvin
introduction: During his acceptance speech for a lifetime achievement award, Nicolas Chauvin - farmer-soldier, veteran of the Revolutionary and Napoleonic Wars, and father of chauvinism - embarks on a grand monologue, sending him back in time and space.
chinese_title: 尼古拉·沙文的光荣致辞
foreign_title: Le Discours d’acceptation glorieux de Nicolas Chauvin
